column7: MFA candidates are required to maintain a demonstrated level of technical proficiency through a consistent graduate level physical practice. The physical practice of each candidate is determined through advisement and may include ballet technique, modern technique, Alexander Technique, yoga, or additional somatic practices offered in the department. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated to a maximum of 24 hours. Prerequisite: MFA candidate in dance.
column9: Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated to a maximum of 24 hours. Prerequisite: MFA candidate in dance.
